mapper.select: SELECT b.id id, b.order_loading_id order_loading_id, b.plate_number plate_number, b.bucket_no bucket_no, b.export_company export_company, g.id g_id, g.local_cust g_local_cust, g.hk_cust g_hk_cust, g.order_loading_id g_order_loading_id, g.bucket_id g_bucket_id, g.plate_number g_plate_number, g.good_type g_good_type, g.packing_type g_packing_type, g.fcl_number g_fcl_number, g.unit_weight g_unit_weight, g.addition_number g_addition_number, g.addition_weight1 g_addition_weight1, g.addition_weight2 g_addition_weight2, g.total_number g_total_number, g.total_weight g_total_weight, g.loading_confirm_state g_loading_confirm_state, g.sending_confirm_state g_sending_confirm_state, g.sending_confirm_notes g_sending_confirm_notes, g.state g_state FROM oms_order_loading_bucket b left join oms_bucket_goods_detail g on b.order_loading_id = g.order_loading_id AND b.id = g.bucket_id WHERE b.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT l.loading_no loading_no, l.loading_date loading_date, l.plate_number plate_number, b.export_company export_company, e.enum_map_value d_good_type, SUM(d.total_number) d_total_number, SUM(d.total_weight) d_total_weight FROM oms_order_loading l, oms_order_loading_bucket b, oms_bucket_goods_detail d, sys_enum e WHERE l.id = b.order_loading_id AND l.id = d.order_loading_id AND b.id = d.bucket_id AND e.enum_type = 'GOOD_TYPE' AND d.good_type = e.enum_value AND l.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY l.loading_date, d.plate_number, b.export_company, e.enum_map_value;

select l.loading_date, g.local_cust, g.good_type, sum(g.freight_fee) freight_fee, sum(g.total_weight) total_weight, sum(g.total_number) total_number, group_concat(distinct l.plate_number) plate_number, group_concat(distinct b.bucket_no) bucket_no, group_concat(g.sending_confirm_notes) notes from oms_order_loading l, oms_order_loading_bucket b, oms_bucket_goods_detail g where l.id = g.order_loading_id and l.id = g.order_loading_id and b.id = g.bucket_id
and g.state > 2 group by l.loading_date, g.local_cust, g.good_type order by l.loading_date desc, g.local_cust desc;

select l.loading_date, l.loading_no, g.plate_number, g.packing_type, sum(g.freight_fee) freight_fee, sum(g.total_weight) total_weight, sum(g.total_number) total_number, group_concat(g.sending_confirm_notes) notes from oms_order_loading l, oms_order_loading_bucket b, oms_bucket_goods_detail g where l.id = b.order_loading_id and l.id = g.order_loading_id and b.id = g.bucket_id
and g.state > 2 group by l.loading_date, g.plate_number, g.packing_type order by l.loading_date desc, g.plate_number desc;

select d.good_type good_type, sum(d.total_number) total_number, sum(d.total_weight) total_weight, sum(d.freight_fee) freight_fee from oms_order_loading l, oms_bucket_goods_detail d where l.id = d.order_loading_id and d.state > 0 and l.loading_date = #{currDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by d.good_type

select t.datelist loading_date, d.local_cust local_cust, sum(d.total_number) total_number, sum(d.total_weight) total_weight, sum(d.freight_fee) freight_fee from date_table t left join oms_order_loading l on l.loading_date = t.datelist left join oms_bucket_goods_detail d on l.id = d.order_loading_id and d.state > 0 where t.datelist between #{currDate,jdbcType=DATE} and ADDDATE(#{currDate,jdbcType=DATE}, 7) group by l.loading_date, d.local_cust
